$interpreted: Soohyeon: (No... I can't continue keeping secrets from mom. I have to tell her about this...)
Soohyeon: It's okay, Soohyeon... you've got to be brave. Just tell her what happened.
Soohyeon: I'm sure mom will help me. She'll stay by my side... not toss me out.
Nice Warrior: Miss Soohyeon, I'm here with—
Soohyeon: Yaaah!!
Nice Warrior: Ahh!!
Soohyeon: I'm sorry! Are you okay? Did I spill any on you?
Nice Warrior: I'm just fine! Did you burn yourself, Miis Soohyeon? That tea was very hot...
Soohyeon: Don't worry about me. I'm glad you're okay.
Nice Warrior: Arbiter Maeok is in the middle of a meeting, she'll be out shortly. Wait just a moment and I'll bring you another cup of tea.
Soohyeon: Thank you very much...
Yonghyeon: Hey, move it! Make way!
Nice Warrior: What's all this!? I'll have to tell the Arbiter!
Soohyeon: Yonghyeon! Are you hurt!?
Yonghyeon: I'm fine, but this guy...
Yonghyeon: He got attacked by one of those bewitched nutjobs! He's lost a lot of blood.
Hurt Warrior: Damn! That's the third time this month!
Yonghyeon: What are you doing just standing there, Soohyeon? Help us out!
Soohyeon: I... I...
Maeok: The doctor's already waiting inside. Bring him in, quickly!
Maeok: Yonghyeon, what is the meaning of this!?
Yonghyeon: On the way here I saw that guard getting attacked by a bewitched...
Yonghyeon: I stepped in and helped, but he was still badly hurt...
Maeok: So that means there's a bewitcher around? Did you see them?
Yonghyeon: I saw someone in the distance, it might have been a bewitcher, but I didn't have time to chase them... I'm sorry...
Maeok: No, it's quite alright. You did the right thing, Yonghyeon. He would have died if it weren't for you.
Maeok: I thank you, on behalf of the Alliance.
Yonghyeon: It's okay, there's no need to thank me... But...
Yonghyeon: There's been more and more bewitched lately. Does that mean there's more bewitchers, too?
Maeok: Hm... It was about three years ago when some beasts started to change, started to look more like humans.
Maeok: It threw the East Alliance into chaos...
Yonghyeon: Does no one know what's causing it still?
Maeok: No one has any idea. And now this curse is just popping up more and more... If it keeps on like this...
Maeok: Relay these orders. Increase patrols and double the bounty for any caught bewitchers.
Maeok: No matter what tribe, all citizens must report any information they have on bewitchers' whereabouts, or else face severe consequences.
Waiting Warrior: Yes, Arbiter Maeok!
Soohyeon: Mom, I've heard rumors that people have been coming in and making up information just to get a reward...
Maeok: Yes... Sometimes citizens acting on blind rumors or fear come in with faulty information...
Maeok: And yes, some people will fabricate information just for the money. Then our men waste their time chasing shadows...
Soohyeon: So then... why double the rewards? Won't that just make things worse? People might start selling out their friends just for a buck!
Yonghyeon: What do you mean sell out their friends!? If someone's bewitched, people need to report it! You get bewitched and you die, that's it!
Yonghyeon: Honestly, thinking about having no fur... just a bunch of weird smooth skin... Yuck!
Soohyeon: ......
Maeok: If we don't find a way to get rid of them, the east will never be at peace.
Maeok: We can't leave any stone unturned. Even if there are some hiccups along the way.
Maeok: Now, don't go running around outside, Soohyeon. Be careful.
Soohyeon: ...I understand.
Maeok: Eh? Did I scare you, Soohyeon?
Maeok: Let me look at you.
Maeok: Soohyeon?
Soohyeon: I... I just remembered I forgot something. I have to go get it... I'll see you tomorrow, mom.
Yonghyeon: What's up with her?
Maeok: ......
Soohyeon: (Mom... Yonghyeon... If you knew what I was, then you'd... you'd...)
Li Hwa: Meong Sa! Stop running! You're coming back with me!!
Soohyeon: (That's...!)
Soohyeon: (A human...? No... It's a... bewitcher!?)
Meong Sa: Li Hwa, I'm begging you!
Meong Sa: Let me go home and see my family! Just one more time! I just want to see that they're okay, then I'll go back to Pearl Palace!
Li Hwa: You can't! You know it's dangerous... You know everyone's looking for people like you right now!
Li Hwa: I understand how you feel. I know it's hard, but... please, be patient. Do this for your family.
Meong Sa: No! I'm the one who's cursed, here, not you! How could you know how I feel!?
Meong Sa: You'll never understand! Never!
Soohyeon: (Oh no! Is she gonna attack Li Hwa!?)
Soohyeon: Don't hurt Miss Li Hwa!!

Model.Text: (No... I can't continue keeping secrets from mom. I have to tell her about this...)
It's okay, Soohyeon... you've got to be brave. Just tell her what happened.
I'm sure mom will help me. She'll stay by my side... not toss me out.
Miss Soohyeon, I'm here with—
Yaaah!!
Ahh!!
I'm sorry! Are you okay? Did I spill any on you?
I'm just fine! Did you burn yourself, Miis Soohyeon? That tea was very hot...
Don't worry about me. I'm glad you're okay.
Arbiter Maeok is in the middle of a meeting, she'll be out shortly. Wait just a moment and I'll bring you another cup of tea.
Thank you very much...
Hey, move it! Make way!
What's all this!? I'll have to tell the Arbiter!
Yonghyeon! Are you hurt!?
I'm fine, but this guy...
He got attacked by one of those bewitched nutjobs! He's lost a lot of blood.
Damn! That's the third time this month!
What are you doing just standing there, Soohyeon? Help us out!
The doctor's already waiting inside. Bring him in, quickly!
Yonghyeon, what is the meaning of this!?
On the way here I saw that guard getting attacked by a bewitched...
I stepped in and helped, but he was still badly hurt...
So that means there's a bewitcher around? Did you see them?
I saw someone in the distance, it might have been a bewitcher, but I didn't have time to chase them... I'm sorry...
No, it's quite alright. You did the right thing, Yonghyeon. He would have died if it weren't for you.
I thank you, on behalf of the Alliance.
It's okay, there's no need to thank me... But...
There's been more and more bewitched lately. Does that mean there's more bewitchers, too?
Hm... It was about three years ago when some beasts started to change, started to look more like humans.
It threw the East Alliance into chaos...
Does no one know what's causing it still?
No one has any idea. And now this curse is just popping up more and more... If it keeps on like this...
Relay these orders. Increase patrols and double the bounty for any caught bewitchers.
No matter what tribe, all citizens must report any information they have on bewitchers' whereabouts, or else face severe consequences.
Yes, Arbiter Maeok!
Mom, I've heard rumors that people have been coming in and making up information just to get a reward...
Yes... Sometimes citizens acting on blind rumors or fear come in with faulty information...
And yes, some people will fabricate information just for the money. Then our men waste their time chasing shadows...
So then... why double the rewards? Won't that just make things worse? People might start selling out their friends just for a buck!
What do you mean sell out their friends!? If someone's bewitched, people need to report it! You get bewitched and you die, that's it!
Honestly, thinking about having no fur... just a bunch of weird smooth skin... Yuck!
If we don't find a way to get rid of them, the east will never be at peace.
We can't leave any stone unturned. Even if there are some hiccups along the way.
Now, don't go running around outside, Soohyeon. Be careful.
...I understand.
Eh? Did I scare you, Soohyeon?
Let me look at you.
Soohyeon?
I... I just remembered I forgot something. I have to go get it... I'll see you tomorrow, mom.
What's up with her?
(Mom... Yonghyeon... If you knew what I was, then you'd... you'd...)
Meong Sa! Stop running! You're coming back with me!!
(That's...!)
(A human...? No... It's a... bewitcher!?)
Li Hwa, I'm begging you!
Let me go home and see my family! Just one more time! I just want to see that they're okay, then I'll go back to Pearl Palace!
You can't! You know it's dangerous... You know everyone's looking for people like you right now!
I understand how you feel. I know it's hard, but... please, be patient. Do this for your family.
No! I'm the one who's cursed, here, not you! How could you know how I feel!?
You'll never understand! Never!
(Oh no! Is she gonna attack Li Hwa!?)
Don't hurt Miss Li Hwa!!
